questions.question_text: Which actions can a promiscuous IPS take to mitigate an attack? (Choose three)
Which command is needed to enable SSH support on a Cisco Router?

choices.E: TACACS encrypts only the password field in an authentication packet
choices.B: TACACS can encrypt the entire packet that is sent to the NAS
choices.A: TACACS uses TCP to communicate with the NAS
choices.C: TACACS authenticates and authorizes simultaneously, causing fewer packets to be transmitted
choices.D: TACACS uses UDP to communicate with the NAS

questions.question_text: In which three ways does the TACACS protocol differ from RADIUS? (Choose three)

choices.B: to determine whether data is relevant
choices.C: to create a process for accessing data
choices.A: to ensure that only authorized parties can modify data

questions.question_text: What is the purpose of the Integrity component of the CIA triad?
questions.answer: D. to ensure that only authorized parties can view data
questions.answer_ET: D. to ensure that only authorized parties can view data

choices.C: You can access all interfaces on an ASA using Telnet.
choices.A: You may VPN to the lowest security interface to telnet to an inside interface.
choices.D: You must use the command virtual telnet to enable Telnet.
choices.B: You must configure an AAA server to enable Telnet

questions.question_text: Which two statements about Telnet access to the ASA are true? (Choose two)
questions.answer_ET: E. Best practice is to disable Telnet and use SSH
questions.answer: E. Best practice is to disable Telnet and use SSH
